item.title: Copyright and the distributed lexicon
item.description: Citeable as Hugh Paterson III. 2019. Copyright and the Distributed Lexicon. Presentation at the 6th International Conference on Language Documentation & Conservation (ICLDC), Connecting Communities, Languages & Technology, February 28-March 3, 2019, at the Hawaiʻi Imin International Conference Center on the campus of the University of Hawaiʻi at Mānoa. ​
